channel.title: Hey, I'm Kevin
channel.description: Recent content on Hey, I'm Kevin

item.title: Hello Friend
item.description: “Hello, friend?” That’s lame. Maybe I should give you a name… But that’s a slippery slope. You’re only in my head. We have to remember that… Shit. It’s actually happened. I’m talking to an imaginary person. ‚Äî Mr. Robot S01E01 Yes I am a fan of mr robot, this is just a test jaja

item.title: Hey there,
item.description: I’m Kevin. I’m a software engineer who loves building stuff and learning cool things in the way. My favorite programming languages and technologies are Python üêç, C, C++, Go üêπ, Docker üê≥, Linux and everything open source. I am a big fan of science, love learning foreign languajes and I think re-inventing the wheel is a great idea sometimes. This page is completely static and makes use of Hugo and Github Pages.
